languages.text: "Верно. В Просторе вообще значительно больше тайных сотрудников Касбаллики, чем думается большинству. Просто мы предпочитаем работать конспиративно. Зачем вскрывать всю агентуру, когда можно вести дела через нескольких открытых сторонников? Раньше наши интересы на Футфоле представлял Владайм. Теперь руководство хочет, чтобы лицом организации стала я".

"That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."
languages.original_text: "Верно. В Просторе вообще значительно больше тайных сотрудников Касбаллики, чем думается большинству. Просто мы предпочитаем работать конспиративно. Зачем вскрывать всю агентуру, когда можно вести дела через нескольких открытых сторонников? Раньше наши интересы на Футфоле представлял Владайм. Теперь руководство хочет, чтобы лицом организации стала я".

traits.locale_text: "That's right. There are plenty more of disguised Kasballican agents in the Koronus Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate delicately, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the next face of our organisation."

"That's right. There are plenty more of disguised Kasballican agents in the Koronus Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate delicately, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the next face of our organisation."

"That's right. There are plenty more of disguised Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate delicately, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests in Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the next face of our organisation."

Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests in Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the next face of our organisation."

"That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

"That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

languages.text: 「その通り。皆が思っている以上、エクスパンスにはカスバリカの偽装したスパイが大勢いるわ。単純なことだけど、活動は慎重に行いたいからね。少数の公的なコネクションを通じて仕事ができるのに、ネットワーク全体を明らかにする必要はないでしょ。かつてはヴラダイムがフットフォールでの我々の利権の代表者だったけど、今は、指導者層は私に組織の代表になってほしいみたい」
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。皆が思っている以上、エクスパンスにはカスバリカの偽装したスパイが大勢いるわ。単純なことだけど、活動は慎重に行いたいからね。少数の公的なコネクションを通じて仕事ができるのに、ネットワーク全体を明らかにする必要はないでしょ。かつてはヴラダイムがフットフォールでの我々の利権の代表者だったけど、今は、指導者層は私に組織の代表になってほしいみたい」

languages.text: « En effet. La Kasballica a beaucoup plus d'agents dans les Étendues qu'on pourrait le croire. C'est juste qu'on préfère agir discrètement. Pourquoi dévoiler notre réseau tout entier quand on peut faire affaire par l'intermédiaire de quelques contacts publics ? Vladaym a longtemps représenté nos intérêts à Castel, et maintenant, nos dirigeants veulent que je prenne le relais. »
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. La Kasballica a beaucoup d'agents infiltrés dans les Étendues, bien plus qu'on pourrait le croire. C'est juste qu'on préfère agir discrètement. Pourquoi dévoiler notre réseau tout entier quand on peut faire affaire par l'intermédiaire de quelques contacts publics ? Vladaym a longtemps représenté nos intérêts à Castel, et maintenant, nos dirigeants veulent que je prenne le relais. »

languages.text: “没错，科罗努斯扩区这个地方，卡斯巴利卡有很多伪装起来的代理人，比绝大多数人想象得要多得多。我们喜欢谨慎行事，就是这么简单。既然可以通过几个公开身份的联系人做生意，那为什么还要暴露整个生意网络？我们在落脚港的代言人原本是弗拉迪姆，但现在，我们的领导层打算让我成为新的代言人。”
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: “没错，科罗努斯扩区这个地方，卡斯巴利卡有许多伪装起来的代理人，比绝大多数人想象得要多得多。我们喜欢谨慎行事，就是这么简单。既然可以通过几个公开身份的联系人做生意，那为什么还要暴露整个生意网络？我们在落脚港的代言人原本是弗拉迪姆，但现在，我们的领导层打算让我成为新的代言人。”

languages.text: "Richtig. Es gibt mehr getarnte Kasballica-Agenten in der Ausdehnung, als die meisten glauben. Wir operieren lieber unauffällig, so einfach ist das. Wozu das ganze Netzwerk offenbaren, wenn Ihr auch über einige wenige öffentliche Kontakte Geschäfte machen könnt? Vladaym hat unsere Interessen in Footfall vertreten. Jetzt will unsere Führung, dass ich das nächste Gesicht unserer Organisation werde."
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: "Richtig. Es gibt mehr getarnte Kasballica-Agenten in der Ausdehnung, als die meisten glauben. Wir operieren lieber unauffällig, so einfach ist das. Wozu das ganze Netzwerk offenbaren, wenn Ihr auch über einige wenige öffentliche Kontakte Geschäfte machen könnt? Vladaym hat unsere Interessen in Footfall vertreten. Jetzt will unsere Führung, dass ich das nächste Gesicht unserer Organisation werde."

languages.text: «Así es. En la Extensión hay muchos más agentes de la Kasballica de lo que la gente cree, pero actuamos con discreción. ¿Qué necesidad hay de revelar a toda la red si puedes hacer negocios con unos pocos contactos públicos? Vladaym es quien solía representarnos en Paso, pero ahora la dirección quiere que yo sea el rostro de la organización».
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. En la Extensión hay más agentes encubiertos de la Kasballica de lo que la gente cree, pero actuamos con prudencia. ¿Qué necesidad hay de revelar a toda la red si puedes hacer negocios con personas de a pie? Vladaym es quien solía representarnos en Paso, pero ahora la dirección quiere que yo sea el siguiente rostro de la organización».

languages.text: "Öyleyim. Enginlik'teki Kasballica mensuplarının sayısı, çoğu insanın sandığından fazladır. El altından çalışmayı tercih ederiz. Adı duyulmuş birkaç eleman üzerinden iş yapmak varken şebekenin tamamını ifşa etmenin lüzumu yok. Eskiden Binliman'daki çıkarlarımızı Vladaym temsil ederdi. Şimdi yönetim, örgütün yüzü olarak onun yerini almamı istiyor."
languages.original_text: "That's right. There are far more Kasballican agents in the Expanse than most people think. We prefer to operate discreetly, it's as simple as that. Why reveal the entire network when you can do business through a few public contacts? Vladaym used to represent our interests on Footfall. Now our leadership wants me to become the face of our organisation."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Enginlik'teki Kasballica adamlarının sayısı, sanılandan fazladır. El altından çalışmayı tercih ediyoruz. Bu kadar basit. Adı duyulmuş birkaç eleman üzerinden iş yapmak varken, şebekenin tamamını ifşa etmenin lüzumu yok. Eskiden Binliman'daki menfaatlerimizi Vladaym temsil ederdi. Liderlerimiz, artık örgütün yüzü olarak onun yerine geçmemi istiyor."
